name: Last Heroes 2
description: Find out what is ahead for Amelia and Roland, as they are headed to Odaro continent, in this new entry in the hit RPG series Last Heroes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

reviews.review_text: This game is... FANTASTIC, I only opened for two minutes and i was already blown away by the fantastic game menu! After play for 5 minutes of gameplay I was ready to write my review. I am also not a paid reviewer!!!!!!
